mapper.select: select X.book_id,X.title,X.author,X.category_id,X.max_num,X.entry_day,X.updatetime,X.isdeleted,X.page,Y.loan_day,Y.plan_day from m_book as X left outer join (select * from t_loan where user_id=#{user_id}) as Y on X.book_id=Y.book_id where X.isdeleted=0;

select X.book_id,X.title,X.author,X.category_id,X.max_num,X.entry_day,X.updatetime,X.isdeleted,X.page,Y.loan_day,Y.plan_day from m_book as X left outer join (select * from t_loan where user_id=#{user_id}) as Y on X.book_id=Y.book_id where X.isdeleted=0 and title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%');

select X.book_id,X.title,X.author,X.category_id,X.max_num,X.entry_day,X.updatetime,X.isdeleted,X.page,Y.loan_day,Y.plan_day from m_book as X left outer join (select * from t_loan where user_id=#{user_id}) as Y on X.book_id=Y.book_id where X.isdeleted=0 and author like CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%');
